name: Laravel Identify
description: Laravel 5 Package to Detect Users Browsers, Devices, Languages and Operating Systems.
author: unicodeveloper

name: made-in-nigeria
description: It is rumored that Nigerians only know how to consume tools and not create them. Here is a curation of awesome tools built by Nigerians that can be used by anybody and from anywhere in the world.
author: acekyd

name: Trivial.Utility
description: A simple Nuget package library which contains helper methods that make performing simple task easy in .Net, C#
author: dwakelKnight

name: Internship Ghana
description: Simple node.js web app that scrapes and presents a list of internship opportunities in Ghana for students.
author: Rho_mheow
